Avatar.title: Avatar
Avatar.description: You can manage your avatar here.
Avatar.help: Click the avatar on the right to select an image.
Avatar.tips: Although this setting is optional, we still recommend you to set an avatar.

Name.title: Username
Name.description: You can manage your username here. Username is your unique identifier (one of them), so your username cannot be the same as others.

Password.title: Password
Password.description: You can manage your password here. Password must be at least 8 characters and include at least one letter, one number, and one uppercase letter.
Password.note: After saving, you will be logged out.
Password.success: Updated successfully, please log in again

Passkey.title: Passkeys
Passkey.description: Add a passkey for passwordless sign-in on supported devices.
Passkey.unsupported: This browser/device does not support WebAuthn passkeys.
Passkey.count: {count, plural, =0 {0 passkeys} one {# passkey} other {# passkeys}}

removeDialog.title: Remove passkey
removeDialog.description: Are you sure you want to remove "{name}"? You may no longer be able to sign in with this passkey.

validation.currentPassword: Current password must be at least 8 characters
validation.password: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordConfirm: Confirm password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordRegex: Password must be at least 8 characters and include at least one letter, one number, and one uppercase letter
validation.passwordDiff: Password and confirm password do not match

Email.title: Email
Email.description: You can manage your email here. We will send a verification code to your existing email, then you can fill in the new email and complete the verification.
Email.help: Existing email not available? Please contact the administrator for the next step.
Email.success: Updated successfully, please log in again

step1.title: Verify current email
step1.description: Verification code has been sent to your current email, if you don't receive it, please check your spam folder.

step2.title: Verify new email
step2.description: Fill in the new email and complete the verification.

validation.email: Please enter a valid email address

Language.title: Language
Language.description: You can update your language preference here.

ContentLimit.title: Content limit
ContentLimit.description: You can update your content display preferences here.
ContentLimit.tipsDescription: This setting will take effect in 30 minutes. You can also log in again to make the changes take effect immediately.

ToastPosition.title: Toast position
ToastPosition.description: You can set where global toast notifications appear.
ToastPosition.tipsDescription: This setting will only be saved to your local browser and will not be uploaded to Shionlib servers.

Aria2.title: Aria2
Aria2.description: You can update your Aria2 settings here.
Aria2.tipsDescription: This setting will only be saved to your local browser and will not be uploaded to Shionlib servers.
Aria2.downloadPathPlaceholder: Leave empty to use Aria2 default path

Test.title: Test Connection
Test.unauthorized: Authentication failed, please check your secret

BindModal.title: Connect PotatoVN
BindModal.description: Enter your PotatoVN credentials. Your password is only used to obtain an access token and will not be stored.

UnbindConfirm.title: Disconnect PotatoVN
UnbindConfirm.description: This will remove the connection between your account and PotatoVN. Your PotatoVN data will not be deleted.

Delete.title: Delete favorites
Delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this favorites? This will delete all games in this favorites. This action cannot be undone.

validation.nameMinLength: Favorites name must be at least {length} characters
validation.nameMaxLength: Favorites name must be at most {length} characters
validation.descriptionMaxLength: Favorites description must be at most {length} characters
